Typealiases.html#/s:15CredentialsHTTP17U.name: UserProfileLoader
Typealiases.html#/s:15CredentialsHTTP17U.abstract: Type alias for the callback that loads the user profile for the given user ID (invoking the provided closure).

Typealiases.html#/s:15CredentialsHTTP14V.name: VerifyPassword
Typealiases.html#/s:15CredentialsHTTP14V.abstract: Type alias for the callback that verifies the userId and password and if

Protocols/TypeSafeHTTPBasic.html#/s:15Cr.name: realm
Protocols/TypeSafeHTTPBasic.html#/s:15Cr.abstract: The realm for which these credentials are valid (defaults to User)

Protocols/TypeSafeHTTPBasic.html#/s:15Cr.name: verifyPassword(username:password:callback:)
Protocols/TypeSafeHTTPBasic.html#/s:15Cr.abstract: The function that takes a username, a password and a callback which accepts a TypeSafeHTTPBasic instance on success or nil on failure.

Protocols/TypeSafeHTTPBasic.html#/s:15Cr.name: provider
Protocols/TypeSafeHTTPBasic.html#/s:15Cr.abstract: The name of the authentication provider (defaults to HTTPBasic)

Protocols/TypeSafeHTTPBasic.html#/s:15Cr.name: authenticate(request:response:onSuccess:onFailure:onSkip:)
Protocols/TypeSafeHTTPBasic.html#/s:15Cr.abstract: Authenticate incoming request using HTTP Basic authentication.

Classes/CredentialsHTTPDigest.html#/s:15.name: redirecting
Classes/CredentialsHTTPDigest.html#/s:15.abstract: An indication as to whether the plugin is redirecting or not.

Classes/CredentialsHTTPDigest.html#/s:15.name: authenticate(request:response:options:onSuccess:onFailure:onPass:inProgress:)
Classes/CredentialsHTTPDigest.html#/s:15.abstract: Authenticate incoming request using HTTP Digest authentication.

Classes/CredentialsHTTPBasic.html#/s:15C.name: redirecting
Classes/CredentialsHTTPBasic.html#/s:15C.abstract: An indication as to whether the plugin is redirecting or not.

Classes/CredentialsHTTPBasic.html#/s:15C.name: authenticate(request:response:options:onSuccess:onFailure:onPass:inProgress:)
Classes/CredentialsHTTPBasic.html#/s:15C.abstract: Authenticate incoming request using HTTP Basic authentication.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
